events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The customer's request has been classified under the refund category due to the nature of their complaint.
A customer support agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle this case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason you would like a refund to proceed further?
Sure, my order number is 4532789. The product arrived damaged and is not usable, so I want my money back.
Thanks for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and help. I appreciate the support with this refund process.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. Please check your email for the refund confirmation details.
Just checking in to ensure that you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory on your end.
We are closing this case now, but please do not hesitate to contact us again if you need any further assistance.
